titles: The nature of Christianity in the true light asserted in opposition to antichristianism, darkness, confusion, & sin-pleasing doctrines : being a looking glass for sin-pleasing professors of all sorts / written upon particular occasion herein signified, by a servant of Christ, G. Whitehead.
author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
notes: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"An aditional postscript by George Keith to Robert Gordon"--p. 60-69.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  England --  Apologetic works.
